title: Let My Guard Down
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Geez…. Stop making that face, you’re driving me nuts….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I know, but I just can’t help but hate myself….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You don’t have to worry that much about it, you know? You’re so serious on the weirdest things, Eli<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>But, I even told Honoka and the others to not drink too much. And now…. I….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It happens sometimes. Besides, bubble teas are delicious. So it can’t be helped<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah…. They’re delicious aren’t they. I let my guard down because they’re just drinks<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You would think that they’re better than frozen drinks with whipped cream, huh. That’s a misconception though<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Nico. At times like this, let’s consult Umi. We’ll have her create a special training!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Why does Nico have to go!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Because I kept coming back there with you, obviously! Come on, let’s go!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
